Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.utility

Class CapacityUtility

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.utility.CapacityUtility
public final class CapacityUtility extends Object
Static methods for handling the bandwidth calculation.

    • CapacityUtility

      public CapacityUtility()

  • Method Details

    • calculateNeededCapacity

      public static long calculateNeededCapacity(long messageSizeInBit, long delayInNs) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Calculates the needed bandwidth for one message according to the messageSize and the delay. for the same size, a message with a short delay would consume more bandwidth during transmission.
      Parameters:
      messageSizeInBit - messageSize given in [bit]
      delayInNs - delay as transmissionTime, given in [ns]
      Returns:
      The needed bandwidth in [bit/s]
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if delay or message size were set to invalid values

    • calculateNeededDelay

      public static long calculateNeededDelay(long messageSizeInBit, long availableBandwidth)
      Calculates the needed bandwidth for one message according to the messageSize and the available bandwidth.
      Parameters:
      messageSizeInBit - messageSize given in [bit].
      availableBandwidth - Available bandwidth in [bit/s].
      Returns:
      The needed delay in [ns]

    • isCapacitySufficient

      public static boolean isCapacitySufficient(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, CellConfiguration nodeCellConfiguration, long neededBandwidth)
      Checks if the bandwidth of the given region and of the given node is sufficient to perform the transmission.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to be checked for available bandwidth
      mode - The mode of the transmission that should be checked
      nodeCellConfiguration - The cell configuration of the given node that is checked
      neededBandwidth - The needed bandwidth for the transmission
      Returns:
      true if the bandwidth in the system is sufficient for the transmission, false if the bandwidth is not sufficient

    • consumeCapacity

      public static void consumeCapacity(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, CellConfiguration nodeCellConfiguration, long consume)
      Consumes some of the available bandwidth based on the given message.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to consume the bandwidth from
      mode - Up or downstream
      nodeCellConfiguration - The cell configuration of the node that is involved in the communication
      consume - The amount of consumed bandwidth in bit/s

    • getMessageLengthWithHeaders

      public static long getMessageLengthWithHeaders(V2xMessage msg, String senderOrReceiver)
      Helper-function to get the effective message length in bits. For each message, a header is assumed to be present according to the protocol type (UDP or TCP) and the link layer (ethernet for servers, or cellular for mobile devices). According to our definition, we measure / simulate the message data size on the Link Layer (MAC Layer).
      Parameters:
      msg - V2X message.
      Returns:
      The length of the V2X message.

    • isAvailable

      public static boolean isAvailable(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, CellConfiguration nodeCellConfiguration)
      Checks whether a new transmission is possible or whether the minimal bandwidths are undershot. This method is used to check whether the delay should be extended artificially or whether the packet is dropped. When too much bandwidth is already used (the region or the node is not available) it might be better to drop/queue the packet and wait until the bandwidth becomes available again.
      Parameters:
      region - The current region of the node
      mode - The desired transmission mode
      nodeCellConfiguration - The cell configuration of the node that is involved in the communication
      Returns:
      Returns true when the available bandwidth is above the minimal threshold, returns false when the available bandwidth is not above the minimal threshold.

    • availableCapacity

      public static long availableCapacity(TransmissionMode mode, CNetworkProperties region, CellConfiguration nodeCellConfiguration)
      The method returns the available bandwidth for a node in a region. The available bandwidth depends on the left capacity in the region and the left bandwidth of the node.
      Parameters:
      mode - The mode of the transmission
      region - The region where the transmission will take place
      nodeCellConfiguration - The cell configuration of the node whose bandwidth is checked
      Returns:
      The available bandwidth for a transmission of a node in the region.

    • getStreamingBandwidth

      public static long getStreamingBandwidth(V2xMessage v2xMessage)
      Get the bandwidth for the stream.
      Parameters:
      v2xMessage - V2X message.
      Returns:
      Bandwidth for the streaming in [bit/s].
